line.comment: * SWM3 war duration increase for major factions which are currently at war with player
* SWM3 war motivation reduction upon player sector loss

line.text: 'The Sith have taken control of the sector '

line.comment: * Reputation hit to $sector.owner AND adjacent factions.

line.text: 'It seems that some "volunteers" are willing to join me. I should go to the trading station in '
' to see one of Niklas guys.'

line.comment: * SWM3 no more rep loss until phase 3 if option B or C has been chosen in the phase 2 Mando plot
* Keep track of how many Unknown sectors the AI conquered.
* Truce. Yakis cannot offer or receive truce agreements.

sval.val: The Sith have taken control of the sector
It seems that some "volunteers" are willing to join me. I should go to the trading station in
to see one of Niklas guys.
SWM3 war duration increase for major factions which are currently at war with player
SWM3 war motivation reduction upon player sector loss
Reputation hit to $sector.owner AND adjacent factions.
SWM3 no more rep loss until phase 3 if option B or C has been chosen in the phase 2 Mando plot
Keep track of how many Unknown sectors the AI conquered.
Truce. Yakis cannot offer or receive truce agreements.
